title: 'Many Diwalis have come and gone without trade deal..': UK's Labour Party on FTA with India
content: UK Shadow Foreign Secretary and Labour Party leader, David Lammy, emphasized signing a free trade agreement with India and strengthening the Strategic Partnership between New Delhi and London.
summary: UK Shadow Foreign Secretary and Labour Party leader, David Lammy, emphasized signing a free trade agreement with India and strengthening the Strategic Partnership between New Delhi and London.

title: Hajj deaths put spotlight on underworld of illicit tour operators
Bibi: Intense Gaza ops winding down, to focus on Hezbollah
Russia summons US envoy to protest Ukraine’s use of ‘US missiles’ in Crimea
content: The Russian Foreign Ministry summoned the American ambassador over the use of US-made ATACMS missiles in a Ukrainian attack on Russian-annexed Crimea. The attack killed four and injured over 150, escalating tensions between the US and Russia.
summary: The Russian Foreign Ministry summoned the American ambassador over the use of US-made ATACMS missiles in a Ukrainian attack on Russian-annexed Crimea. The attack killed four and injured over 150, escalating tensions between the US and Russia.

Elon Musk's 12 children: What we know about them
content: ​X Æ A-Xii (pronounced as X Ash A Twelve), Musk and Grimes' first son, was born in May 2020. In December 2021, they welcomed their first daughter Exa Dark Sideræl (pronounced as Sigh-deer-ee-el) via surrogate. Their son, originally named X Æ A-12, had to have his name legally changed to follow California laws on birth certificates, though his parents simply refer to him as “X.”
summary: ​X Æ A-Xii (pronounced as X Ash A Twelve), Musk and Grimes' first son, was born in May 2020. In December 2021, they welcomed their first daughter Exa Dark Sideræl (pronounced as Sigh-deer-ee-el) via surrogate. Their son, originally named X Æ A-12, had to have his name legally changed to follow California laws on birth certificates, though his parents simply refer to him as “X.”

'Appalled': Joe Biden condemns 'antisemitic' protest outside LA Synagogue
content: ​“I’m appalled by the scenes outside of Adas Torah synagogue in Los Angeles,” Biden said in post on social media site X. “Intimidating Jewish congregants is dangerous, unconscionable, antisemitic, and un-American.” Fighting between pro-Palestinian demonstrators and counterprotesters erupted Sunday outside the Adas Torah synagogue in the heavily Jewish Pico-Robertson neighborhood and police were called in to break it up. In a statement, Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said the violence was “abhorrent” and that blocking access to a place of worship was unacceptable.
summary: ​“I’m appalled by the scenes outside of Adas Torah synagogue in Los Angeles,” Biden said in post on social media site X. “Intimidating Jewish congregants is dangerous, unconscionable, antisemitic, and un-American.” Fighting between pro-Palestinian demonstrators and counterprotesters erupted Sunday outside the Adas Torah synagogue in the heavily Jewish Pico-Robertson neighborhood and police were called in to break it up. In a statement, Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass said the violence was “abhorrent” and that blocking access to a place of worship was unacceptable.

title: Canada stops post-graduate work permit for foreigners at port entry
content: Flagpoling is a legal practice but it is takes officers on both sides of the border away from their crucial role in protecting the safety, security and prosperity of Canadians and Americans. The Immigration Refugees and Citizenship Canada announced that it has banned post-graduate work permit for foreign nationals at the Canadian border.
summary: Flagpoling is a legal practice but it is takes officers on both sides of the border away from their crucial role in protecting the safety, security and prosperity of Canadians and Americans.  The Immigration Refugees and Citizenship Canada announced that it has banned post-graduate work permit for foreign nationals at the Canadian border.

title: Muted mics, no props: List of new rules for 1st Biden, Trump debate
content: There will be no live studio audience to react to the debate -- in a stark departure from the tradition. This is to ensure that the candidates may maximize the time allotted in the debate. Candidates will have two minutes to answer questions. No props or pre-written notes will be allowed on the stage. Candidates will be given a pen, a pad of paper and a bottle of water. Trump's campaign chose the order of closing statements that he will speak last. Biden will give his concluding statement first.
summary: There will be no live studio audience to react to the debate -- in a stark departure from the tradition. This is to ensure that the candidates may maximize the time allotted in the debate. Candidates will have two minutes to answer questions. No props or pre-written notes will be allowed on the stage. Candidates will be given a pen, a pad of paper and a bottle of water. Trump's campaign chose the order of closing statements that he will speak last. Biden will give his concluding statement first.

title: 3.5 magnitude earthquake hits Los Angeles
content: Residents in Los Angeles were startled by a 3.2 magnitude earthquake near Highland Park. No significant damage was reported, and authorities reminded the public to be prepared for aftershocks, future tremors, safety measures, and authorities.
summary: Residents in Los Angeles were startled by a 3.2 magnitude earthquake near Highland Park. No significant damage was reported, and authorities reminded the public to be prepared for aftershocks, future tremors, safety measures, and authorities.

title: 'Hawk tuah' girl was not fired after viral meme. Her real name is...
content: If 'Hawk tuah' was not hilarious enough, a satire page now claimed she was fired from Epstein Day School after her 'hawk tuah' went viral because her students started spitting on each other. Social media users were naive enough to believe in the satirical article while the 'hawk tuah' trend continues to soar.
summary: If 'Hawk tuah' was not hilarious enough, a satire page now claimed she was fired from Epstein Day School after her 'hawk tuah' went viral because her students started spitting on each other. Social media users were naive enough to believe in the satirical article while the 'hawk tuah' trend continues to soar.

title: Video of Trump spokesperson 'cut off' on air by CNN viral
content: ​Karoline Leavitt, the spokesperson of Donald Trump's campaign, was abruptly cut on a CNN show and the video has gone viral. This came days before CNN is set to host the first presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump. Karoline shared X posts condemning how she was cut off in the middle. Karoline and CNN anchor Kasie Hunt took their debate on X thereafter.
summary: ​Karoline Leavitt, the spokesperson of Donald Trump's campaign, was abruptly cut on a CNN show and the video has gone viral. This came days before CNN is set to host the first presidential debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump. Karoline shared X posts condemning how she was cut off in the middle. Karoline and CNN anchor Kasie Hunt took their debate on X thereafter.

title: Ex-Obama fundraiser says she will vote for Trump. Explains 'divorce'
content: Allison Huynh, a former fundraiser for Barack Obama, said she will be voting for Republican presumptive presidential candidate Donald Trump for the first time -- divorcing the Democratic Party. After years of supporting the Democrats, she said Joe Biden is asleep at the wheel while she now finds Donald Trump as knowledgeable, funny and intelligent. ​“I was happy with how knowledgeable Trump is about what is going on with the country and the economy. ,He had the information,” she said
summary: Allison Huynh, a former fundraiser for Barack Obama, said she will be voting for Republican presumptive presidential candidate Donald Trump for the first time -- divorcing the Democratic Party.
